content: CREATE ME A SIMPLE HELLO WORLD PAGE NO NEED FOR ANY DESCRIPTION

Certainly! I'll create a simple "Hello World" page for you without any additional description. We'll update the existing `Index.tsx` file to display the "Hello World" message.



This change updates the Index page to display a simple "Hello World" message.
</HST-code>

The "Hello World" page has been created and set as the index page.
